name: Re:Trace
description:
This is a 3rd person action puzzle solving game, where the player act as a mysterious spirit seeker and explore different scenes on Tibet land, guided by a sacred one.

In the game, the players actions consists of different parts: 
1. Run(WASD/LS), Turning Camera(Mouse/RS), Jump(Space/B) that enables you to explore different terrain.
2. Fast Run(Shift/RB) to jump longer.
3. Call Spirit Ball(Right click/X) to summon the spirit ball to activate different objects.

Along the journey, you will see the guidance of spirits and pieces of history clips that tells the past of the main character. In the end, the story of the player will be shown.

Developers:
Minmin Jiang - Artist & Designer,
Lantian Liang - Artist & Designer,
Yifei Yan - Programmer & Technical Artist.

This game is a demo project that shows our capabilities and thinkings of designing and developing a 3D game. Its relevant designing concepts and foundationing techniques are presented in the final presentations of our undergraduate studies.
